definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: draw together, shut (NH = BH; Ar. qafas.a collect, conjoin, tie; Syr. qpas draw together, contract, withdraw (cf. Nö:M 47: ZMG xxxiii (1879), 516); Targum [[קְפַץ]] hasten (double oneself up in running),

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. ´[[ק]]: Ps 77:10, etc.; Impf. 2 ms. [[תִּקְפּׂץ]] De 15:7; 3 mpl. [[יִקְפְּחוּ]] Is 52:15;—shut hand De 15:7 (c. [[מִן]] away from, so as not to lend; opp, [[פתח]] v:De 15:8); mouth, in astonishment Is 52:15, in abject silence Job 5:16, Ps 107:42; fig. [[רַחֲמָיו]] ´[[ק]]: Ps 77:10 shut up his compassion.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[יִקָּֽפְחוּן]] Job 24:24 si vera l., they draw themselves together, of contraction in death (cf. Di Bu; Ol [[יִקָּֽבְחוּן]] are gathered in).

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pt. [[מְקַפֵּץ עַל־הַגְּבָעוֹת]] Ct So 2:8 springing (i.e. making repeated contractions of body, in taking leaps) upon the hills (‖[[מְרַלֵּג]]).
